name: National Domestic Violence Hotline
description: 24/7 support for domestic violence survivors. Confidential help from trained advocates.

name: Crisis Text Line
description: Free 24/7 crisis support via text message. Text with a trained crisis counselor.

name: National Suicide Prevention Lifeline
description: Free and confidential support for people in distress, prevention and crisis resources.

name: RAINN National Sexual Assault Hotline
description: 24/7 support for survivors of sexual assault. Confidential crisis support and referrals.

name: Legal Services Corporation
description: Provides civil legal assistance to low-income Americans. Can help with protective orders and family law.

name: National Center for Victims of Crime
description: Legal advocacy and support for crime victims. Help navigating the justice system.

name: WomensLaw.org Hotline
description: Legal information and resources for domestic violence survivors. State-specific legal info.

name: National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI)
description: Mental health support and counseling referrals. Free information and support.

name: SAMHSA National Helpline
description: Substance abuse and mental health treatment referral service. Free and confidential.

name: National Child Traumatic Stress Network
description: Resources and referrals for children and families dealing with trauma.

name: National Safe Place
phone_number: Text SAFE and your location to 69866
description: Immediate help for youth in crisis. Connects to nearby safe places and emergency services.

name: National Runaway Safeline
description: Crisis intervention and referrals for runaway and homeless youth. Shelter referrals available.

name: Salvation Army Emergency Services
description: Emergency shelter, food, and housing assistance. Local shelter referrals.

name: National Health Information Center
description: Health information and referrals to health services. Can help find medical care.

name: Planned Parenthood Hotline
description: Reproductive health services and information. Confidential medical care and referrals.

name: National Nurse Helpline
description: Speak with a registered nurse about health concerns. Free medical advice and referrals.

name: Love Is Respect
description: Support for teens and young adults in dating relationships. Text LOVEIS to 22522.

name: StrongHearts Native Helpline
description: Culturally-appropriate support for Native Americans affected by domestic violence.

name: National Center on Elder Abuse
description: Resources and support for elder abuse victims and concerned individuals.
